casebody.data:
W. G. BURD v. MARTHA LEE BURD 31 So. (2nd) 928

June Term, 1947

September 19, 1947 Division B H. E. Oxford and Oxford & Oxford, for appellant. Wm. C. Norvell, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.

On consideration of appellee’s motion to require appellant to pay attorney of record for appellee for attorney’s fee for defending this appeal in this court, it is ordered that appellant pay to the attorney for appellee $50.00 as compensation to said attorney for defending this appeal in this court.

THOMAS, C. J., BUFORD, ADAMS and BARNS, JJ., concur.
